full_text: Knitted heart/Christmas decoration in DROPS Fiesta. Work piece in the round in stocking stitch, bottom up. Theme: Christmas. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropswinterpinehearts DROPS design: Pattern fs-018 Yarn group B SIZE: Piece measures approx. Width = 10 cm Height: = 10 cm YARN : DROPS FIESTA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 50 g colour 16, herb garden / 20, northern lights / 07, sea green / 13, dark ivy ACCESSORIES : Some cotton wool for filling String or left-over yarn for strap. 1 heart weighs approx. 10 grams with filling. NEEDLES : DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3.5 mm KNITTING TENSION: 22 stitches in width and 30 rows vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3.5 = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE! Remember that needle size is only a suggestion. If you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles. If you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles.
name: Ravelry: 0-1636 Winter Pine Hearts pattern by DROPS design
